description: Whether it’s a beach bash or beyond, the all-new Oh Buoy 2N1 Swim Short is set to make a massive splash. Combining other-worldly prints and exceptional comfort, this swim style is primed for your next pool party. Featuring a 4-way stretch shell with an integrated ultra-light mesh liner and the BallPark Pouch™, Oh Buoy offers unreal support in and out of water – meaning you can go from beach to brewery without a second thought.
name: Saxx Underwear Oh Buoy 2n1 Volley, 7" Inseam - Mens
